name: Hyperjump Room
description:
Hi! This game I made for minimalist jam #1 theme is multi so I use multi-jump as the main mechanic. This is the first puzzle(?) game that I made. This game has 15 levels.

All SFX and "Minimal house" music are made by iLikeCola12 (Youtube| Soundcloud)

How to play

Pass a level by reach a flag on a stage by using a multi jump. 

Controls :

  • arrow key for move and jump
  • R for restart level
  • Space bar for Zoom in/out

Have fun :)
